pullRequest.title: Add document outlining safety mechanisms of java agent.
pullRequest.bodyText: I need a doc to link to for internal reviews about the safety of a java agent, a generally very scary concept. But ours has many nice safety mechanisms and this should be enough to assuage most fears.

commit.message: Add document outlining safety mechanisms of java agent.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This document outlines the safety mechanisms we have in place to have confidence
          
          
            
            that the Java agent can be attached with a very low chance of affecting a user's
          
          
            
            app in a negative way, for example introducing crashes.
          
          
            
            This document outlines the safety mechanisms we have in place to have confidence
          
          
            
            that the Java agent can be attached to an user's application with a very low chance of 
          
          
            
            affecting it in a negative way, for example introducing crashes.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,78 @@
+# OpenTelemetry Java Agent Safety Mechanisms
+
+This document outlines the safety mechanisms we have in place to have confidence
+that the Java agent can be attached with a very low chance of affecting a user's
+app in a negative way, for example introducing crashes.
